title: Flight 93 National Memorial: Views of the Memorial
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery     Views of the Memorial                Views of the Memorial                    Views of the Visitor Center Complex   10 Photos  This gallery contain assorted images of the Visitor Center Complex which opened on September 10, 2015          Views of the Memorial Plaza   11 Photos  Images of the main element of the memorial currently open - the Memorial Plaza at the crash site.          Wildflower meadow at the Memorial Plaza   4 Photos  The memorial marks this land as a place of violence and a place of healing and renewal. A wildflower meadow sweeping up the slopes above the Memorial Plaza at the crash site brings color and life to a once scarred landscape.            Wetlands at Dusk   4 Photos  Sunset over the wetlands near the Memorial Plaza. The return of wildlife habitats is part of the long-term plan for the memorial landscape.
